actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that Federal employees who are required to remain at work when other Federal employees are dismissed because of emergency or adverse weather conditions shall be entitled to overtime rates of pay.

summary.text: Entitles to overtime rates of pay Federal employees performing critical services who are required to remain at work when other agency employees have been dismissed without charge to leave or loss of pay due to emergency or adverse weather conditions.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that Federal employees who are required to remain at work when other Federal employees are dismissed because of emergency or adverse weather conditions shall be entitled to overtime rates of pay.
